mapper.insert: insert into tb_voucher_order(id, user_id, voucher_id, pay_type, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{voucherId}, #{payType}, #{status}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update tb_seckill_voucher set stock = (stock - 1) where voucher_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select voucher_id as voucherId, stock as stock, create_time as createTime, begin_time as beginTime, end_time as endTime, update_time as updateTime from tb_seckill_voucher where voucher_id = #{id}
